## Form.sendkey() method

Simulate keystroke from a field. The field is located from the block, field an optionally css-class

**Signature:**

```typescript
sendkey(key: KeyMap, block?: string, field?: string, clazz?: string): Promise<boolean>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  key | [KeyMap](./forms42core.keymap.md) | The keystroke to simulate. |
|  block | string | _(Optional)_ The block containing the field (optional). |
|  field | string | _(Optional)_ The field to simulate the keystroke on (optional). |
|  clazz | string | _(Optional)_ The CSS class (optional). |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;boolean&gt;

A promise indicating whether the keystroke simulation was successful.
